item.title: Megadeth - Hangar 18
item.description:
Welcome to
our fortress tall
Take some time
to show you around
Impossible to break
these walls
For you see
the steel is
Much too strong
computer banks
To rule the world
instruments
To sight the stars
possibly I’ve seen
To much hangar 18
I know too much-

Foreigh life
forms inventory
Suspended state of
cryogenics selective
Amnesia’s the story
believed foretold
But who suspect
the military
Intelligence
two words combined
That can’t make sence
possibly I’ve seen
To much hangar 18
I know too much-
